name: Schuss Mountain at Shanty Creek
description: Schuss Mountain at Shanty Creek Resort combines variety, terrain, and well-maintained conditions with friendly guest service and everyday low rates, creating a spectacular winter getaway. With 42 downhill runs, alpine tubing, 25km of cross-country trails, and a host of family-friendly winter activities, youll find Schuss Mountain at Shanty Creek Resort delivers a better value.
